definition: (of a clause) capable of standing syntactically alone as a complete sentence, a principal pipe in a system that distributes water or gas or electricity or that collects sewage
details:
adjective
- (of a clause) capable of standing syntactically alone as a complete sentence
= synonyms: independent
- most important element
= synonyms: chief, primary, principal, master
- of force
noun
- a principal pipe in a system that distributes water or gas or electricity or that collects sewage
- any very large body of (salt) water
= synonyms: briny
